title: Pedersen Bows before Irresistible Pogačar after Tour of Flanders Powershow: ‘This Man Is the Best Cyclist in the World’
content:
Lidl-Trek tandem of Pedersen and Stuyven head toward Paris-Roubaix with a tailwind after 'super magical' 2nd and 5th-place finishes in Flanders.

Read the full article at Pedersen Bows before Irresistible Pogačar after Tour of Flanders Powershow: ‘This Man Is the Best Cyclist in the World’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
